arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'CarePlan' adds the 'carePlan' attribute below to the 'CarePlanGoal' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: carePlan

constantValues: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient, group or community for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition.

value.description: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient, group or community for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'CarePlanGoal' adds the 'goal' attribute below to the 'CarePlanGoal' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: goal

constantValues: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan. Goal can be achieving a particular change or merely maintaining a current state or even slowing a decline.

value.description: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan. Goal can be achieving a particular change or merely maintaining a current state or even slowing a decline.
